item.title: Cropping a video using FFMPEG
item.description: I needed to crop a video that I used as part of a video on my YouTube channel, Learn Data With Mark, and Camtasia kept rendering a black screen. So I had to call for FFMPEG! Cropping the bottom of a video My initial video was 2160 x 3840 but I didn’t need the bottom 1920 pixels because I’m using that part of the screen for a video of me.
